item.title: UAA
item.description: score:-94 Chances: Revenues and earnings beat in first-quarter fiscal 2024. Direct-to-consumer revenues rose 4% in the quarter. Exploration of potential wholesale partnerships in various retail channels. Positive earnings and revenue surprises for the quarter ended June 2023. Launch of ‘UA Rewards’ loyalty program to engage loyal consumers.
